mapper.select: select ts1.STANDARD_ID AS standardId, ts1.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID AS tncStdItemId, ts1.TNC_STD_VAL1 AS tncStdVal1, ts1.TNC_STD_VAL2 AS tncStdVal2, ts1.TNC_STD_VAL3 AS tncStdVal3, ts1.REMARK AS remark, ts2.CONTENT AS content2, ts2.EFT_DATE AS eftDate2, ts3.CONTENT AS content3, ts3.EFT_DATE AS eftDate3 from pd_technical_standard ts1 left join pd_technical_standard ts2 on ts1.PD_TNC_STD_ID = ts2.PD_TNC_STD_ID and ts2.GRADE_CODE = '2' left join pd_technical_standard ts3 on ts1.PD_TNC_STD_ID = ts3.PD_TNC_STD_ID and ts3.GRADE_CODE = '3' where ts1.GRADE_CODE = '1'
mapper.sql: A.STANDARD_ID AS standardId, A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID AS tncStdItemId, A.TNC_STD_VAL1 AS tncStdVal1, A.TNC_STD_VAL2 AS tncStdVal2, A.TNC_STD_VAL3 AS tncStdVal3, (CASE WHEN A.STANDARD_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '1' ELSE '0' END) AS isCheck, A.REMARK AS remark
B.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID AS tncStdItemId, B.TNC_STD_ITEM_NAME AS tncStdItemName, B.LEVEL_ID AS levelId, B.PARENT_ID AS parentId, B.IS_CATALOG AS isCatalog
mapper.insert:
insert into PD_TNC_STD( STANDARD_ID, TNC_STD_ITEM_ID, TNC_STD_VAL1, TNC_STD_VAL2, TNC_STD_VAL3,
DEL_FLG, CRT_TIME) VALUES( #{standardId},#{tncStdItemId},#{tncStdVal1},#{tncStdVal2},#{tncStdVal3},'0',NOW() )
mapper.update: update PD_TNC_STD set TNC_STD_VAL1=#{tncStdVal1}, TNC_STD_VAL2=#{tncStdVal2}, TNC_STD_VAL3=#{tncStdVal3}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg}, UPD_TIME=NOW() WHERE STANDARD_ID=#{standardId} AND TNC_STD_ITEM_ID=#{tncStdItemId}
